faqs.question: Can I customize the writing templates?
faqs.answer: Yes, our tool offers customizable templates to suit your specific needs.

faqs.question: Does the tool check for plagiarism?
faqs.answer: Yes, our writing assistant includes a plagiarism detection feature.

faqs.question: What types of content can I generate with this tool?
faqs.answer: You can generate a wide range of content including articles, blog posts, essays, and more.

faqs.question: Is the tool suitable for non-native English speakers?
